title: The Bachelor's Matt Agnew looks downcast amid split rumours
text:
Fans of The Bachelor are worried about Matt Agnew's relationship with Chelsie McLeod, after noticing the couple haven't been pictured together in weeks.

And on Wednesday, the 32-year-old astrophysicist fueled break-up rumours as he was spotted looking downcast on his morning commute.

Matt, who works for data analytics company Quantium in Melbourne's CBD, failed to raise a smile on his way to the office.

Thinking about Chelsie? The Bachelor's Matt Agnew fueled break-up rumours on Wednesday as he was spotted looking downcast on his morning commute in Melbourne's CBD

Matt dressed casually in a loose fitting shirt and jeans, which he paired with a brown leather jacket and white Adidas sneakers.

He was clean shaven and wore his trademark black spectacles while strolling towards his workplace on Bourke Street.

Despite professing his love for Chelsie in The Bachelor finale, he doesn't appear to be spending much time with his new girlfriend.

Is everything okay? Matt, who works for data analytics company Quantium, failed to raise a smile on his way to the office

Fans have expressed concern that Matt recently went on holiday without Chelsie, with one person asking her on Instagram: 'Why is Matt still not around?'

But despite these fears, the 28-year-old chemical engineer has denied rumours their relationship is already on the rocks.

In response to a follower who asked about Matt's whereabouts, Chelsie explained he had flown to Dubai to catch up with his UK-based family.

On the rocks? Despite professing his love for Chelsie McLeod (left) in The Bachelor finale, Matt (right) doesn't appear to be spending much time with his new girlfriend

Speculation: Fans have expressed concern that Matt recently went on holiday without Chelsie, with one person asking her on Instagram, 'Why is Matt still not around?

'Matt joined them on their holiday in Dubai, not that I really need to give a reason why,' Chelsie wrote.

'Now Matt has met his baby nephew, he'll be back in no time, I can assure you!'

The couple officially began their relationship after the Bachelor finale, which was filmed earlier this year and aired on September 19.
description: Fans of The Bachelor are worried about Matt Agnew's relationship with  Chelsie McLeod, after noticing the couple haven't been pictured together in weeks.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
